job.title: Senior ETL AWS Machine Learning Data Engineer
job.description:
Senior ETL AWS Machine Learning Engineer

My client has a full time opening for a Sr Machine Learning Engineer. You MUST be Senior Level, also you must be a Citizen or GC holder to qualify for this role. The ideal candidate will have recent experience with Snowflake sitting on AWS Services!!

Skills Needed To Succeed
  • Deployment of Data Models
  • Work closely to support the Data Science team
  • SQL
  • Python
  • Spark
  • Snowflake
  • Linux
  • ETL
  • Automation
  • Data mining
  • AWS
  • Azure
  • Data Modeling
  • Data Warehousing
If you have these skills, then this opportunity could be for you. Please contact me directly via phone or email. If not, don't rule yourself out quite yet because I have multiple openings that may be an even better fit for you.

Edgar Unthank

Diversity & Inclusion Practice Lead

Liberty Personnel Services, Inc.

410 Feheley Drive | King of Prussia, PA 19406

Direct Line: 484.238.1943
